title: IVA-Based Customized English Learning Design for Beginner EFL Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational English vocabulary and grammar knowledge (middle school level)
context.additional_context: Course involving interaction with IVA in smartphone-based LMS environments to learn situational job-related English expressions. Strengthens language proficiency applicable to real employment scenarios through project-based assessment

learning_goals: Through daily conversations with an IVA (Intelligent Virtual Agent), learners can achieve beginner-level English speaking fluency (CEFR A1–A2).
Learners can use essential job-related expressions (e.g., resume writing, interview practice) with 80% accuracy.
Based on personalized feedback from an IVA, learners can create and implement self-directed learning plans.

resources: English Learning IVA with Voice Recognition Support
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
